entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: SE 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then partly cloudy. Freezing rain inland early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
